Dear MPV driver As of January 2021  you are required to paste our sticker to remain as a MPV Driver.Drivers who do not get our stickers pasted on their vehicles by 12th May 2021 will be reclassified as Car drivers instead.We're enhancing the Driver Selection feature! Starting 28 April 2021  Sticker Drivers will get a bigger advantage over Non-Sticker Drivers in accepting orders and thus earning more income.Don't miss out and earn more by joining our sticker program now:http://bit.ly/lalamovesticker!
